mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CMIS_MEM(member_name, user_id, member_pw, member_sex, member_age, member_phone, member_address, member_sns, member_lv) VALUES(#{member_name}, #{user_id}, #{member_pw}, #{member_sex}, #{member_age}, #{member_phone}, #{member_address}, #{member_sns}, #{member_lv})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id,member_pw,member_name,member_lv FROM CMIS_MEM WHERE user_id=#{user_id} AND member_pw=#{member_pw}
